import React from "react"; import { Modal, Button, Form, Container } from "react-bootstrap"; import joi from "joi"; export default function LoginModal(props) { const schema = joi.object({ username: joi.string().alphanum().min(5).max(30).required(), password: joi.string().min(8).required(), repeat_password: joi.ref("password"), }); const { isOpen, handleClose } = props; return (
Add account
Forgot your password?
); }
